scripts.deploy:patch: vercel deploy --prod && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.deploy:minor: vercel deploy --prod && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.deploy:major: vercel deploy --prod && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.client:public:generate:typescript:patch: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key public && cd ./client/typescript/public/api-json && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.client:public:generate:typescript:minor: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key public && cd ./client/typescript/public/api-json && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.client:public:generate:typescript:major: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key public && cd ./client/typescript/public/api-json && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.client:admin:generate:typescript:patch: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key admin && cd ./client/typescript/admin/api-json && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.client:admin:generate:typescript:minor: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key admin && cd ./client/typescript/admin/api-json && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.client:admin:generate:typescript:major: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key admin && cd ./client/typescript/admin/api-json && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.client:auth:generate:typescript:patch: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key auth && cd ./client/typescript/auth/api-json && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.client:auth:generate:typescript:minor: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key auth && cd ./client/typescript/auth/api-json && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.client:auth:generate:typescript:major: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key auth && cd ./client/typescript/auth/api-json && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.client:auth:generate:dart:patch: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key auth:dart --additional-properties dartSupport=true && cd ./client/dart/auth/api-json && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.client:auth:generate:dart:minor: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key auth:dart --additional-properties dartSupport=true && cd ./client/dart/auth/api-json && npm version minor && cd ../..
scripts.client:auth:generate:dart:major: openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key auth:dart --additional-properties dartSupport=true && cd ./client/dart/auth/api-json && npm version major && cd ../..
scripts.vercel-build: tsc && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build
scripts.migration:generate:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:generate -d src/config/db/ormconfig.ts ./src/config/db/migrations/local/InitialSchema
scripts.migration:generate:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:generate -d src/config/db/ormconfig.ts ./src/config/db/migrations/development/InitialSchema
scripts.migration:generate:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:generate -d src/config/db/ormconfig.ts ./src/config/db/migrations/production/InitialSchema
scripts.migration:run:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:run -d src/config/db/ormconfig.ts
scripts.migration:run:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:run -d src/config/db/ormconfig.ts
scripts.migration:run:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:run -d src/config/db/ormconfig.ts
